articles.title: German election: Final push as frontrunner Merz vows to lead in Europe - BBC.com
articles.description: Germany's rival political leaders take their fight for votes right to the last minute before a pivotal election.
articles.content:
Paul KirbyEurope digital editor in Germany
Merz is convinced he is on track for victory and has exuded confidence in party rallies
Germany's rival political leaders will take their fight for votes … [+5350 chars]
